item.title: LVMH 集团着眼于美国车间的扩张，但任何转变都可能是有限的
item.description: 路威酩轩集团（LVMH）首席执行官贝尔纳-阿尔诺（Bernard Arnault）引发了一场关于法国商业吸引力的讨论。【原文：LVMH chief executive Bernard Arnault has sparked a debate over France's attractivity for business.】

item.title: 聚焦：为何难以阻止中国 DeepSeek 使用美国人工智能
item.description: 白宫高级顾问本周对中国的 DeepSeek 可能得益于一种方法表示震惊，这种方法被称为 "蒸馏法"，据称可以捎带美国竞争对手的进步。【原文：Top White House advisers this week expressed alarm that China's DeepSeek may have benefited from a method that allegedly piggybacks off the advances of U.S. rivals called "distillation."】

item.title: VIEW 美联储按兵不动，偏向鹰派，未提及通胀进展
item.description: 美联储周三将利率维持在4.25%至4.50%的目标区间，并对在通胀仍高于目标、经济持续增长、失业率较低的经济环境下何时可能进一步放宽政策未作深入探讨。【原文：The Federal Reserve left interest rates in the 4.25% to 4.50% target range on Wednesday and gave little insight into when further easing may take place in an economy where inflation remains above target, growth continues, and the unemployment rate is low.】

item.title: 彭博社报道：特朗普官员正在讨论加强对英伟达在华销售的限制
item.description: 据彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周三报道，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的政府正在考虑加强对人工智能领军企业英伟达（Nvidia）销售其专为中国市场设计的H20芯片的限制。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's administration is considering tightening restrictions on artificial intelligence leader Nvidia's sales of its H20 chips designed for the China market, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，雷诺寻求在本田合并案中实现日产股份价值最大化
item.description: 一位接近此事的消息人士告诉路透社，雷诺高管本周前往日本与日产汽车公司的同行会面，试图在日产与本田合并之前，最大限度地提高这家法国汽车制造商所持日本公司股份的价值。【原文：Renault executives travelled to Japan this week to meet counterparts at Nissan in an effort to maximise the value of the French automaker's stake in the Japanese firm ahead of its merger with Honda, a source close to the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 加拿大部长表示美国的任何关税回应都不会单独针对阿尔伯塔省
item.description: 加拿大能源和自然资源部长乔纳森-威尔金森（Jonathan Wilkinson）周三表示，加拿大对美国关税的任何回应都将是地区性的公平和公正，而不会单独针对加拿大的主要产油省阿尔伯塔省。【原文：Any Canadian response to U.S. tariffs will be regionally fair and equitable and not single out Alberta, Canada's main oil-producing province, Canada's Energy and Natural Resources Minister Jonathan Wilkinson said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Alphabet 旗下 Waymo 将在 10 多个新城市测试自动驾驶技术
item.description: Alphabet 的自动驾驶部门 Waymo 周三宣布，它计划在 2025 年在 10 多个新城市扩大自动驾驶技术的测试范围。【原文：Alphabet's self-driving unit Waymo announced on Wednesday it plans to expand testing of its autonomous driving technology in over 10 new cities in 2025.】

item.title: 米兰市长站在 Mediobanca 一边，称 MPS 的出价与罗马-米兰相匹配
item.description: 米兰市长朱塞佩-萨拉（Giuseppe Sala）周三在国家支持的锡耶纳蒙蒂帕斯基银行（MPS）发起的收购战中站在了 Mediobanca 一边，这标志着这场金融风波正变得越来越政治化。【原文：Milan mayor Giuseppe Sala on Wednesday sided with Mediobanca in a takeover battle launched by state-backed Monte dei Paschi di Siena (MPS), signalling the financial saga was becoming increasingly political.】

item.title: DeepSeek 的全球成功让中国人感到自豪和欣喜
item.description: 中国博客、国家媒体和当地民众对 DeepSeek 在全球取得的成功感到自豪和欣喜，一些人认为，这家本土人工智能初创公司的飞速崛起表明，中国正在击退华盛顿遏制中国科技产业的企图。【原文：Chinese bloggers, state media and local citizens have welcomed DeepSeek's global success with pride and glee, with some saying the homegrown AI startup's meteoric rise is a sign China is beating back Washington's attempts to contain the country's tech industry.】

item.title: 新报告旨在扭转国际能源署对能源转型的关注
item.description: 根据国际能源机构前石油主管周三发布的一份报告，该机构需要改革其撰写年度能源展望的方式，以反映真实世界的情景，而不是加强其目前对全球能源转型的关注。【原文：The International Energy Agency needs to revamp how it writes its annual energy outlook to reflect real-world scenarios, not to bolster its current focus on the global energy transition, according to a report released on Wednesday by the agency's former oil director.】

item.title: 宾夕法尼亚州州长与 PJM 就容量支付达成协议
item.description: 宾夕法尼亚州州长乔希-夏皮罗（Josh Shapiro）周二表示，他已与电网运营商 PJM Interconnection 达成协议，解决他最近对其电力市场规则的投诉，并在两年内为消费者节省超过 210 亿美元的能源成本。【原文：Pennsylvania Governor Josh Shapiro on Tuesday said he has reached an agreement with grid operator PJM Interconnection to settle his recent complaint about its power market rules and save consumers over $21 billion in energy costs over two years.】

item.title: 诉讼指控亚马逊通过手机秘密跟踪消费者
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）周三遭到消费者起诉，他们指控这家零售巨头通过手机秘密跟踪他们的行踪，并出售收集到的数据。【原文：Amazon.com was sued on Wednesday by consumers who accused the retailing giant of secretly tracking their movements through their cellphones, and selling data it collects.】

item.title: 特朗普商务部长人选卢特尼克表示倾向于按国家征收全面关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普提名的商务部负责人霍华德-卢特尼克周三表示，他已建议特朗普逐国征收全面关税，以恢复贸易互惠和公平。【原文：President Donald Trump's nominee to run the Commerce Department, Howard Lutnick, said on Wednesday that he has advised Trump to impose across-the-board tariffs country-by-country to restore trade reciprocity and fairness.】

item.title: 特朗普商务部长人选称拜登时代的芯片投资需要审查
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普提名的商务部长人选霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）周三表示，拜登时代对美国半导体制造业的补贴是 "极好的首付款"，但需要重新审查。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's nominee for Commerce secretary Howard Lutnick said on Wednesday that the Biden-era subsidies for U.S. semiconductor manufacturing are an "excellent down payment" but need review.】

item.title: 独家报道：Netflix 通过《怪奇物语》授权协议拓展玩具业务
item.description: Netflix 正在扩大其在玩具业务领域的影响力，它与广受欢迎的 Squishmallows 毛绒玩具背后的公司达成了第一份主授权协议，以开发受其热门科幻剧集《怪奇物语》启发的产品系列。【原文：Netflix is expanding its presence in the toy business, striking its first master licensing deal with the company behind the popular Squishmallows plush toys to develop a product line inspired by its hit science-fiction series “Stranger Things.”】

item.title: PIMCO 预计洛杉矶大火后市政债券持有人的付款不会中断
item.description: 美国债券基金管理公司 PIMCO 周三表示，洛杉矶市政债券发行商应该能够消化该地区火灾造成的损失，而不会影响向投资者支付款项。【原文：Los Angeles municipal bond issuers should be able to absorb losses caused by fires in the region without disrupting payments to investors, U.S. bond fund manager PIMCO said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 诺福克南方公司利润超预期，得益于成本削减和保险业复苏
item.description: 美国铁路运营商诺福克南方公司（Norfolk Southern）周三公布的季度利润超过了分析师的预期，这主要得益于为提高利润率而实施的成本削减，以及与一起代价高昂的脱轨事故相关的保险赔款好于预期。【原文：U.S. railroad operator Norfolk Southern on Wednesday posted a quarterly profit that beat analysts' estimates, helped by cost cuts implemented to improve margins and better-than-expected insurance recoveries related to a costly derailment.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟发现公司至少收到两份收购波兰 TVN 广播公司的竞标书
item.description: 一位熟悉此事的消息人士称，波兰商人米哈尔-索洛沃（Michal Solowow）已向华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros Discovery Inc）提出收购当地广播公司 TVN 的要约，而媒体集团 WP Holding 也提出了收购要约。【原文：Polish businessman Michal Solowow has made an offer to buy local broadcaster TVN from Warner Bros Discovery Inc , according to his MS Galleon fund, while media group WP Holding has also made a bid, a source familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 保险需求强劲，Progressive 季度利润增长
item.description: 财产保险公司 Progressive Corp 周三公布，受个人汽车保险需求强劲的推动，该公司第四季度利润增长了 19%。【原文：Property and casualty insurance company Progressive Corp reported a 19% rise in its fourth-quarter profit on Wednesday, driven by strong demand for personal auto insurance policies.】

item.title: -加拿大银行下调利率，称关税战可能造成巨大损失
item.description: 作者：Promit Mukherjee 和 David Ljunggren【原文：By Promit Mukherjee and David Ljunggren】

item.title: 加拿大银行下调 2025 年和 2026 年经济增长预期
item.description: 路透社渥太华1月29日电）加拿大央行周三下调了2025年和2026年的经济增长预期，理由是政府旨在抑制人口增长的政策产生了抑制作用。【原文：OTTAWA, Jan 29 (Reuters) - The Bank of Canada on Wednesday cut its growth forecasts for both 2025 and 2026, citing the dampening effect of government policies designed to curb population growth.】

item.title: DeepSeek 的聊天机器人准确率达到 17%，在 NewsGuard 审计中落后于西方竞争对手
item.description: 在 NewsGuard 的审计中，中国人工智能初创公司 DeepSeek 的聊天机器人在提供新闻和信息方面的准确率仅为 17%，在与 OpenAI 的 ChatGPT 和谷歌双子座等西方竞争对手的比较中，它在 11 个竞争对手中排名第十。【原文：Chinese AI startup DeepSeek's chatbot achieved only 17% accuracy in delivering news and information in a NewsGuard audit that ranked it tenth out of eleven in a comparison with its Western competitors including OpenAI's ChatGPT and Google Gemini.】

item.title: 美联储进入衡量货币市场流动性的艰难时期
item.description: 美联储将于本周三结束其最新的货币政策会议，即将进入一个更具挑战性的时期，即管理大多数观察家认为即将结束的资产负债表缩减。【原文：The Federal Reserve, which wraps up its latest monetary policy meeting on Wednesday, is about to enter one of the more challenging periods of managing what most observers believe is the approaching endgame for its balance sheet drawdown.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，D.E. Shaw 参股比特币矿商 Riot Platforms
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的消息人士称，投资公司 D.E. Shaw 已在 Riot Platforms 建仓，并可能推动其做出改变，这使其成为这家加密货币挖矿公司的第二位激进股东。【原文：Investment firm D.E. Shaw has built a position in Riot Platforms and may push it to make changes, two sources familiar with the matter said, making it the second activist shareholder to do so at the cryptocurrency mining company.】

item.title: 瑞安航空首席执行官奥利里对波音 737 增产充满信心，认为特朗普会给予支持
item.description: 瑞安航空公司首席执行官周三表示，该公司相信波音公司将在今年夏天把737 MAX喷气机的月产量提高到38架，并相信美国总统唐纳德-特朗普政府将允许该公司把月产量提高到42架。【原文：Ryanair is confident that Boeing will ramp up its production of 737 MAX jets to 38 per month this summer and that it will be allowed by the administration of U.S. President Donald Trump to then increase that to 42, its CEO said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Planet Labs 签订 2.3 亿美元协议，为亚洲客户建造卫星
item.description: 卫星图像公司 Planet Labs 周三表示，该公司签署了一项价值 2.3 亿美元的协议，将为亚太地区一家未具名客户建造卫星。【原文：Satellite imagery firm Planet Labs said on Wednesday it signed a $230 million agreement to build satellites for an unnamed customer in the Asia-Pacific region, clinching its biggest contract yet as the company expands beyond data services.】

item.title: Enverus称，2024年美国上游油气交易额将达1050亿美元
item.description: 咨询公司 Enverus 周三表示，2024 年美国上游石油和天然气行业的交易额达到了 1050 亿美元，是有史以来年度交易总额第三高的一年，但下半年交易活动有所放缓，因为买家发现可收购的目标减少了。【原文：Dealmaking in the U.S. upstream oil and gas industry hit $105 billion in 2024, the third highest annual total ever, but activity slowed in the second half as buyers found fewer targets to acquire, consultancy Enverus said on Wednesday.】

item.title: ASML 首席执行官认为 DeepSeek 对芯片需求有利
item.description: 计算机芯片设备制造商ASML公司首席执行官周三表示，高效人工智能模型的出现，如中国DeepSeek公司推出的人工智能模型，对芯片市场是一个净利好。【原文：Computer chip equipment maker ASML's CEO on Wednesday made the case that the advent of efficient AI models such as one China's DeepSeek has launched is a net positive for chip markets.】

item.title: 企业关注美国扩张以减轻潜在关税影响
item.description: 一些公司表示，在准备应对唐纳德-特朗普总统可能征收的关税时，它们正在考虑扩大在美国的业务或在美国开店。【原文：Some companies have said they are looking at expanding their presence or setting up shop in the United States as they prepare for President Donald Trump's potential tariffs.】

item.title: 受进口影响，美国 12 月商品贸易逆差大幅扩大
item.description: 美国 12 月份的货物贸易逆差急剧扩大，这很可能是由于企业因预期唐纳德-特朗普总统的新政府将征收广泛的关税而提前进口货物。【原文：The U.S. trade deficit in goods widened sharply in December, likely as businesses front-loaded imports in anticipation of broad tariffs from President Donald Trump's new administration.】
